page.title: 13THE TOWN CENTRE
page.content: THE MOST OBVIOUS MONUMENT IN THE CENTRE THE MARKET CROSS-IT WAS BUILT IN 1500 BUT DUE TO THE WEAKNESS AND THE SPIRE HAD TO BE RE-BUILT THE WORK BEING CARRIED OUT IN 1841. THE UPPER THIRD OF THE RE-BUILT SPIRE IS TO A MORE SLENDER DESIGN THAN THE ORIGINAL. TODAY IT IS USED FOR STALLS ON MARKET DAY(FRIDAY) OR A GENERAL MEETING PLACE FOR PEOPLE. {THE CENTRE} IT WAS OPENED IN 1973.IT IS ONLY THE 4TH OF ITS KIND IN EUROPE.INSIDE IS A DANCE FLOOR WHICH CAN BE CHANGED INTO A THEATRE BY LOWERING THE DANCE HALL CEILING TO REVEAL 250 SEATS IT ALSO HAS A FULL SIZE SCREEN FOR FILM SHOWS.THE BLACK SWAN RESTAURANT SUITE HAS A BAR AND CABARET FLOOR.WHILST THE CAPETED PUBLIC FOYER GOES TO THE FIRST FLOOR.
